name: Calim Private Equity
overview: Calim invests in opportunities created by new technologies, expanding markets and underdeveloped assets. We don’t confine our interests to a particular stage, business area or geography. To help portfolio companies achieve their full potential, we actively engage through strategic counsel and guidance in developing operational excellence. Our goal at Calim is to create value for our investors and foster success for the entrepreneurs we back.

funding_round.source_description: BluePoint Energy Products, Inc. Closes $5.9 Million Finance Facility With Calim Private Equity, LLC; Receives Initial Funds for Sales Development.
